name: myKidsy.com
description:
What is myKidsy?


myKidsy.com offers innovative after school, weekend and holiday programmes for London based children. myKidsy provides time-poor parents with a comprehensive directory of fun and engaging courses – activities range from art-sessions with famous illustrators, film production, learning how to make robots fly, computer coding as well as an introduction to subjects as varied as philosophy, entrepreneurship and yoga.

Why myKidsy?

We know you are busy. The days of struggling to entertain little ones are over. For working parents – mums in particular– it can be a difficult to find the time to research quality activities, clubs and events for children. By using the myKidsy resources you can feel confident you’ve located great activities for your kids. mykidsy.com combines the fundamental values of education and fun for children, providing basic knowledge and developing life learning experience in diverse areas such as art, music, entrepreneurship, science and much more.

team.title: CEO & Founder
team.name: mykidsy
team.bioHtml: myKidsy is a booking portal which links parents to the highly fragmented market of service providers in children’s education, entertainment and life-skills.

jobs.title: Growth Hacker
jobs.description:
What we do 

MyKidsy is a platform dedicated to children’s after-school, weekends and holiday activities.
In order to save parent’s precious time while offering meaningful and entertaining activities, myKidsy selects high quality clubs and connect them with the dads and mums of the digital era who are relentlessly looking for the perfect spare-time occupation for their children. 
At this stage, our website features already more than 1,500 unique activities and, without clear competition, is a leader on its segment. 
But myKidsy is much more than just an activity finder. 
We help parents steer their kids free time into educational fun. We help them find the most novel and educational activities that go way beyond the music class in the neighborhood.
Our educational vision is about motivating kids into hobbies and activities that will contribute to their further education and growth into becoming citizens of the future society: with empathy for nature, interest for the arts and sciences and passion for sports. 

Why join myKidsy - the first startup in a new platform called ‘Parent Tech'

* Work in the development of a very promising start-up, operating in a totally underserved market with high growth potentialities.
* Opportunity to join for equity and so, invest in an already trusted and proven business model.
* Be a considered and valuable member of an experienced, high-skilled and diverse team with network connections all around the world. 
* Be part of a company with social goals and a meaningful vision 
* Feel the excitement of taking part in a tech start-up adventure with limitless potential diversification opportunities.

--------------------

We are looking for an experienced and skilled growth hacker to co-create and run our customer acquisition strategy, social media marketing, content marketing. 

We would ideally consider applicants young professionals in Marketing or PR with 1-3 years of experience but also more experienced ones that would join for shares in the beginning and then a salary once we are funded.
 Looking for someone who is excited about growth opportunities for disruptive and creative start-ups with high potential. 
The ideal applicant should also be enthusiastic about the new « parent-tech » field and understand the social and educational mission of myKidsy. 
Previous experience in advertising, media, design, growth hacking even on the internship level, is a big plus. 

As a Growth Hacker, you’ll be :

- Driving and designing customer acquisition strategies 
-  increasing customer base exponentially high 
- Able to drive online companies for aggressive growth
- Deliver growth results in a short time 
- Optimizing existing content and site structure to increase organic rankings and traffic 
- Using and managing social media growth hacking tools 


We look for someone with :

- Passion for searching and broader digital marketing, up to date on best practices and breaking trends in SEO, and you understand Millennials' consumer behaviors 
- 2-3 years of experience in a marketing-based role
- Experience with social media, sales, inbound marketing, funnel acquisition and data analytics.
    - Excellent English communication skills (writing and grammar especially).
- Ability to make decisions on the fly with little or no direction and can adjust and adapt to the constant changes that face a startup.
- The capacity of being growth-focused while understanding global issues. 
- Be completely proficient with all social media and networks: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Snapchat, Pinterest, LinkedIn 

---------------------

Please send us: 
- Your resume / CV 
- Professional references 
- A short cover letter explaining why you want to join mykidsy.com and why are you excited about the project 
 	- Including some examples of your achievements as a growth hacking expert.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Developer
jobs.description:
What we do 

MyKidsy is a platform dedicated to children’s  after-school, weekends and holidayguillaume activities.
In order to save parent’s precious time while offering meaningful and entertaining activities, myKidsy selects high quality clubs and connect them with the dads and mums of the digital era who are relentlessly looking for the perfect spare-time occupation for their children. 
At this stage our website features already more than 1,500 unique activities and, without clear competition, is a leader on its segment. 
But myKidsy is much more than just an activity finder. 
We help parents steer their kids free time into educational fun. We help them finding the most novel and educational activities that go way beyond the music class in the neighborhood.
Our educational vision is about motivating kids into hobbies and activities that will contribute to their further education and growth into becoming citizens of the future society: with empathy for nature, interest for the arts and sciences and passion for sports. 

Why join myKidsy - the first start up in a new platform called ‘Parent Tech'

* Work in the development of a very promising start-up, operating in a totally underserved market with high growth potentialities.
* Opportunity to join for equity and so, invest in an already trusted and proven business model.
* Be a considered and valuable member of an experienced, high-skilled and diverse team with network connections all around the world. 
* Be part of a company with social goals and a meaningful vision 
* Feel the excitement of taking part in a tech start-up adventure with limitless potential diversification opportunities.

----------------------

We are looking for a skilled and proficient Full-Stack developer to design, build, develop and deliver our booking platform through a mobile app and a web portal. 

We also need someone that can integrate API and back-end app system with our contractors and partners in order to deliver the most outstanding user experience. 

The ideal applicant should also have international, entrepreneurial mindset and be enthusiastic about the new « parent-tech » field and understand the social and educational mission of myKidsy. 


As a Full-Stack developer, you’ll : 


- Work directly with our co-founder/CTO to augment our software development efforts. 
- Implement APIs and algorithms 
- Design and develop both front-end and back-end mobile apps
- Improve the codebase by constantly looking for places to make things faster, cleaner, clearer.


We look for someone with : 

-Excellent knowledge of implementing Algorithms and APIs
- Background in launching and developing successful online marketplaces 
- An extensive knowledge in computer sciences and web development, especially in booking engines, algorithms. 
- Experience in digital product delivery in B2C web or mobile environments 
- Expert knowledge in mobile app design and development 
- Design and develop both front-end and back-end mobile apps
- Improve the codebase by constantly looking for places to make things faster, cleaner, clearer

- Coding skills in following languages :

Our current site is built in PHP, Javascript, Mysql but future developments might go into more sophisticated computer languages you should know. 
	 HTML, CSS and Javascript 
	Python, Ruby, PHP, Scala, Java, SQL, C/C++ 

---------------------

Please send us: 
- Your resume / CV 
- Professional references 
- A short cover letter explaining why you want to join mykidsy.com and why are you excited about the project 
 	- Including some examples of your achievements as a web/mobile developer

jobs.title: Internship in Communication Manager/ personal assistant
jobs.description:
Looking for a brilliant personal assistant/communications manager asap!


Yasmine Mahmoudieh is a world-renowned interior architecture company with a strong emphasis on unique hotel projects among many others.

( www.mahmoudieh.com)

The tasks will include the following:

For me, the main question will be how you would manage to work on my projects and if you have the qualities and experience to do the following tasks

 

1- organizing the whole operation from the internet to folders including cleaning up the spam messages of emails

2- follow up with leads and business development with superb writing skills and eloquent use of the English language.

3- write a press release

- organize meetings with journalists

4- prepare powerpoint/keynote presentations

5 - liaise with an accountant 

6- take care of social media channels primary Instagram and Twitter and Facebook 

7- be willing to learn how to create exponential growth and be willing to constantly learn

8- prepare contract proposals

9- connect to universities for teaching options

10- apply for Design awards

11- follow up on all communications with potential clients 

12- organize the drop box file

12- prepare my traveling

13- write blogs after my dictation of them and fine-tune them

14- prepare my Ted Talk X

 Please let me know if this fits your experience and interest. 

 Send me a text explaining why you think you would be the right candidate and your credentials please. 

The position can start as an internship but then lead into full employment if successful. 

 Kind regards

Yasmine

jobs.title: Internship in Furniture/Interior Designer
jobs.description:
Looking for a brilliant  Furniture/Interior Designer asap!


Yasmine Mahmoudieh is a world-renowned interior architecture company with a strong emphasis on unique hotel projects among many others.

( www.mahmoudieh.com)

we are looking for a talented intern to work on a project. It is about a playground design for hotels. It would consist of designing cool furniture for children connected to my online marketplace: www.Mykidsy.com. You need to master perspective renderings of interior spaces too.

If you are interested, please us your portfolio

jobs.title: COO Offer
jobs.description:
This is an equity only opportunity until Series seed funding

Our Client’s technology gives viewers quick and easy access to television commercial links and phone numbers that they usually have to copy down or search. In addition, it can be easily shared through Twitter, Facebook, and many other social media platforms. It saves advertisers from expensive search engine clicks and increases conversions. And the data collected improves television attribution and cross-medium ad personalization. 
The technology not only applies to the TV ads but to programming as well, such as shows, news and the like. The tech works on all devices including smartphones, tablets, desktops, and any television. AND, it can be IP licensed and integrated into any MVPD, OTT, Network, and streaming apps.
Are you an Entrepreneur? They are seeking a Chief Executive Officer/ Co-Founder to take them to the next level. 
Are you a COO / Co-Founder with strategic planning and fundraising experience? Where others tend to think or dream, you already take action while radiating energy and enthusiasm
Are you a COO / Co-Founder who has a vision, is a creative thinker, has startup experience, and is very comfortable making presentations to potential investors? You will be empowered to use her/his vision to build this organization. 
Are you a COO / Co-Founder who is a born leader, with extraordinary drive and determination? They need a leader who can build, guide, and motivate a team.
Are you a COO / Co-Founder who is both tactical and strategic? You will have Carte Blanche (move fast and take risks)
As the COO / Co-Founder your major duties will include:
•	Evaluate the technology and recommend any changes necessary
•	Fundraising
•	Finding the quickest way to monetization
•	Interfacing with the board and/or investors
•	Being the public face of the company
•	Plotting marketing and sales strategies for the technology
Requirements:
•	Must have relevant experience launching new technology 
•	Experience raising funding, with angels and VCs
•	Bachelor’s degree, Master’s preferred 
Wearing many hats, developing the culture of the organization, being the lead evangelist, and being the business mind, are just a few of the exciting elements of this opportunity.
Ready to flex your creativity? Send your resume to:  team@myKidsy.com
